Our Story

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.2″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Our portfolio tracker was created with one goal in mind – to help investors make better decisions with their finances. As avid investors ourselves, we noticed that many individuals have their investments spread across several separate platforms, which makes it harder for them to keep track of their portfolio – this is the issue we strive to resolve.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.2″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” header_font=”||||||||” background_layout=”dark” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

The portfolio tracker was created by two ambitious developers/ investors with the hope to make the journey of making investments less perilous. We believe that investing doesn’t have to be as convoluted as others may make it out to be, as with the right data and information, we can all find success with our investments.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Investors” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#101535″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Titillium Web|600|||||||” header_2_font_size=”36px” header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”28px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]
